response.overview: Imagine if you were offered a choice of four gifts: The original Mona Lisa, the keys to a brand new Lamborghini, ten million dollars in cash, or a parachute. Which would you choose? If you have ever asked what happens after we die, if there is a Heaven, or how good we have to be to go there, Why Christianity? will help you. If you have ever wondered which religion you should choose, if any, this DVD will sort through the confusion so that you can make the best choice. Take the time to watch this carefully there's nothing more important than where you will spend eternity.
response.title: Why Christianity?
